lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Since early 1984, banks have been limited to lending 18 times shareholders' equity and reserves on a consolidated basis and Bundesbank officials have said that interest rate and currency swaps and currency options are under scrutiny.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Kuntze declined to detail possible changes to banking regulations, as these are still the subject of discussions between the Supervisory Office and the Bundesbank.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: West German banking regulations must be expanded to cover off-balance sheet risks arising from new financing forms, Federal Banking Supervisory Office President Wolfgang Kuntze said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Since early 1984, banks have been limited to lending 18 times shareholders' equity and reserves on a consolidated basis and Bundesbank officials have said that interest rate and currency swaps and currency options are under scrutiny.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Kuntze declined to detail possible changes to banking regulations, as these are still the subject of discussions between the Supervisory Office and the Bundesbank.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: West German banking regulations must be expanded to cover off-balance sheet risks arising from new financing forms, Federal Banking Supervisory Office President Wolfgang Kuntze said.
